to be used for the care of apparently healthy pregnant women and their babies (i.e. women 
with low-risk pregnancies). Women at high risk of developing labour complications may 
require additional specialized monitoring and care (9).
Upon arrival in the labour unit, women should have an initial assessment to determine 
whether labour has started. Detailed guidance on how to perform an initial evaluation to
